message.content:
{
  "daily_summary": "Broadly positive session for mid/small caps with leadership in pharma (Laurus, Wock, Navin), insurance/AMCs (HDFCAMC, Policybazaar) and select infra/defense (Prestige, MAZDOCK, GRSE). High-volume breadth: PSU banks and telecom saw heavy activity (IDEA, UNIONBANK, INDUSTOWER). Portfolio held gains; strength led by LAURUSLABS and BSE, while IDBI lagged near key ₹100 support.",
  "top_signals": [
    {"symbol": "LTF", "signal": "Buy-on-strength / Add", "reason": "Strong close near day high with solid volume; momentum intact; add on breakout >₹280 with tight stop", "price": 279.70},
    {"symbol": "LAURUSLABS", "signal": "Hold / Trail", "reason": "Follow-through day; momentum continuation; trail stop below ₹955", "price": 975.40},
    {"symbol": "POLICYBZR", "signal": "Watch for breakout", "reason": "Pushed into resistance; trigger above ₹1824 could start next leg", "price": 1810.20},
    {"symbol": "PRESTIGE", "signal": "Buy on dips", "reason": "Fresh highs zone; buy near ₹1750–1765 on pullback; trend strong", "price": 1780.70},
    {"symbol": "HDFCAMC", "signal": "Buy on dips", "reason": "Momentum intact near highs; look ₹5350–5380 zone for entry with stop ~₹5240", "price": 5404.50},
    {"symbol": "INDUSTOWER", "signal": "Watch for continuation", "reason": "Wide-range up day, close near high; continuation above ₹384.5", "price": 382.75},
    {"symbol": "NAVINFLUOR", "signal": "Buy on pullback", "reason": "Gap-and-go; prefer retest toward ₹5800–5860 rather than chase", "price": 5905.50},
    {"symbol": "WOCKPHARMA", "signal": "Momentum long (risky)", "reason": "Big breakout on high volume; consider only small size on dips to ₹1380–1400", "price": 1413.80},
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "signal": "Risk management", "reason": "Weak close; ₹100 is key support. Exit on decisive break below ₹100 to limit drawdown", "price": 101.51},
    {"symbol": "BHEL", "signal": "Hold / Watch 262–268 range", "reason": "Indecision day at resistance; add only on close >₹268 or reduce on break <₹262", "price": 264.95}
  ],
  "emergency_trades": [
    {"symbol": "IDBI", "action": "Sell", "reason": "Protect capital if psychological support fails; momentum turning down in PSU small banks", "quantity": 10, "price": "SL-M below ₹99.80 (trigger 99.80)"}
  ],
  "portfolio": {
    "cash": 806.30,
    "total_value": 26782.40,
    "holdings_count": 6,
    "holdings": [
      "BSE: 1 units @ ₹2385.00 (CMP ₹2548.30)",
      "LTF: 30 units @ ₹266.26 (CMP ₹279.70)",
      "BEL: 20 units @ ₹419.45 (CMP ₹422.30)",
      "LAURUSLABS: 3 units @ ₹900.05 (CMP ₹975.40)",
      "BHEL: 10 units @ ₹265.49 (CMP ₹264.95)",
      "IDBI: 10 units @ ₹103.80 (CMP ₹101.51)"
    ]
  },
  "screening_notes": [
    "IDEA: Massive volume and strong close; momentum buy only if sustained >₹9.60 with tight stop (<₹9.05).",
    "PSU banks mixed: UNIONBANK firm; smaller PSBs (IDBI, UCO, IOB) softer—prefer strength within the pack.",
    "Pharma leadership broadening: LAURUS, WOCKPHARMA, LUPIN, ALKEM, NAVINFLUOR strong—favor buy-the-dip setups.",
    "Realty/Infra: PRESTIGE breakout; OBEROIRLTY and TORNTPOWER constructive; watch TORNTPOWER >₹1352.5 for continuation.",
    "Retail/Discretionary: TRENT near highs; JUBLFOOD needs >₹603 for a clean trigger.",
    "Tech/ER&D: KPITTECH constructive; watch >₹1170; COFORGE steady; PERSISTENT resilient.",
    "Defense/Shipbuilders: MAZDOCK, GRSE, HAL steady uptrends; buy only on pullbacks to prior breakout zones.",
    "Financials: SBICARD basing; watch >₹890; AUBANK support near ₹865–870.",
    "MCX extended after strong run; prefer pullback toward ₹9300–9400 before considering fresh entries.",
    "Data received for 129 of 140 names; remainder not assessed today."
  ]
}
